name: Rats And Ruin
description:
Made for the BlackThorn Prod Jam 3

Survive as many waves as you can. Each round you must select 1-3 towers for destruction. How many can you get through with the hoard of rats coming for your sanctuary

Artists

Josey Meyer & Chloe Gordon

Programmers

David Martinez,  Alex Rose & Jonathon Konderla

Music

Jarod Perez
